title: Divided: A Short Story
description: Florida, Texas, Arizona, South Dakota, and Idaho have seceded. The Constitution has been burned, the Union has divided, and the United States has fallen into the hands of tyrants. In fear of further succession, the federal government considers Constitutionalism treason. Discovered to be a political activist, Bev flees into the night, pursued by federal agents and police dogs. Her only hope is to make it to Alaska where she'll find freedom and the last remnants of the America she once knew.
author: Jennifer Arnett
